reports.title: Select a protein
reports.query:
MATCH (n:`PROTEIN`) 
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`name`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) 
RETURN DISTINCT n.`name` as value,  n.`name` as display ORDER BY size(toString(value)) ASC LIMIT 5

reports.title: Proteins
reports.query:
MATCH (p:PROTEIN)
RETURN  p.name as Name, p.wikidataid as URL

reports.title: Diseases for $neodash_protein_name
reports.query:
MATCH path=(p:PROTEIN)--(p2:DISEASE)
WHERE p.name = $neodash_protein_name
RETURN path

reports.title: Disease Relationships for $neodash_protein_name
reports.query:
MATCH path=(p:PROTEIN)<-[r]-(p2:DISEASE)
WHERE p.name = $neodash_protein_name
RETURN COLLECT( p2.name) as Diseases, type(r) as `Type of Relationship`, r.strength as `Number of publications`
ORDER BY `Number of publications` DESC

reports.title: Substances for $neodash_protein_name
reports.query:
MATCH path=(p:PROTEIN)--(p2:SUBSTANCE)
WHERE p.name = $neodash_protein_name
RETURN path

reports.title: Substance Relationships for $neodash_protein_name
reports.query:
MATCH path=(p:PROTEIN)<-[r]-(p2:SUBSTANCE)
WHERE p.name = $neodash_protein_name
RETURN COLLECT( p2.name) as Diseases, type(r) as `Type of Relationship`, r.strength as `Number of publications`
ORDER BY `Number of publications` DESC

reports.title: Biological Processes for $neodash_protein_name
reports.query:
MATCH path=(p:PROTEIN)--(p2:BIOPROCESS)
WHERE p.name = $neodash_protein_name
RETURN path

reports.title: Biological Process Relationships for $neodash_protein_name
reports.query:
MATCH path=(p:PROTEIN)<-[r]-(p2:BIOPROCESS)
WHERE p.name = $neodash_protein_name
RETURN COLLECT( p2.name) as Diseases, type(r) as `Type of Relationship`, r.strength as `Number of publications`
ORDER BY `Number of publications` DESC

reports.title: Connected Proteins for $neodash_protein_name
reports.query:
MATCH path=(p:PROTEIN)--(p2:PROTEIN)
WHERE p.name = $neodash_protein_name
RETURN path

reports.title: Protein Relationships for $neodash_protein_name
reports.query:
MATCH path=(p:PROTEIN)<-[r]-(p2:PROTEIN)
WHERE p.name = $neodash_protein_name
RETURN COLLECT( p2.name) as Diseases, type(r) as `Type of Relationship`, r.strength as `Number of publications`
ORDER BY `Number of publications` DESC

reports.title: Select a disease
reports.query:
MATCH (n:`DISEASE`) 
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`name`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) 
RETURN DISTINCT n.`name` as value,  n.`name` as display ORDER BY size(toString(value)) ASC LIMIT 5

reports.title: How are these linked (multi-hop) through similar relationships?
reports.query:
MATCH path=(p:DISEASE)-[r]-(p2:DISEASE)-[r2]-(p3:DISEASE)
WHERE p.name = $neodash_disease_name AND p3.name = $neodash_disease_name_2
AND type(r) = type(r2)
//AND toInteger(r.strength) > 1 AND toInteger(r2.strength) > 1
RETURN  p, 
 apoc.create.vRelationship(p, type(r)+' ('+ r.strength +')', properties(r), p2),
p2,
 apoc.create.vRelationship(p2, type(r2)+' ('+ r2.strength +')', properties(r2), p3),
p3

reports.title: Select another disease
reports.query:
MATCH (n:`DISEASE`) 
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`name`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) 
RETURN DISTINCT n.`name` as value,  n.`name` as display ORDER BY size(toString(value)) ASC LIMIT 5
